description:
**Fix Overview**:

To mitigate the denial of service vulnerability in Windows Hyper-V as indicated by CVE-2024-20699, the following updates should be applied:

1. Download and install the relevant KB updates listed below for your version of Windows.
2. Restart your system after installation to ensure the changes take effect.

**Details**:
- The updates are crucial for addressing the hypervisor vulnerability in Windows environments. 
- For manual installation, download the update packages from the following links:
  - [KB5034121](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034121)
  - [KB5034123](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034123)
  - [KB5034122](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034122)
  - [KB5034127](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034127)
  - [KB5034129](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034129)
  - [KB5034130](https://catalog.update.microsoft.com/Search.aspx?q=KB5034130)

**Preconditions**:
- Ensure the system is running a build version listed under the Build Numbers provided.
- Backup critical data before proceeding with the update installation.
